AD.name: Okta Endpoint URL Root
AD.description: Root endpoint for Okta API Calls

AD.name: Okta Client ID
AD.description: Okta Client ID for Okta API Calls

AD.name: Okta Client Secret
AD.description: Okta Client Secret for decrypt JWTToken

AD.name: Okta Registration Flag
AD.description: Okta Registration Flag for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta Redirect URL
AD.description: Okta Redirect URL for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta Login URL
AD.description: Okta Login URL for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta Widget Login URL
AD.description: Okta Widget Login URL for OKTA widget

AD.name: Dev Portal Okta Login URL
AD.description: Used to redirect none authenticated user to Okta login if user attempt to access Developer Portal secure page

AD.name: Okta Issuer URL
AD.description: URL used for JWT verification

AD.name: Okta Audience
AD.description: Audience for JWT verification

AD.name: Okta Connection Timeout
AD.description: Connection timeout in seconds

AD.name: Okta Retry Attempts
AD.description: Number of retries Okta will make

AD.name: Okta passwordlessAuth Flag
AD.description: Okta Password less Auth Flag for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta OktaRememberMeFlag
AD.description: Okta OktaRememberMeFlag for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta idpDiscovery Flag
AD.description: Okta idp Discovery Flag for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta idpDiscovery Value
AD.description: Okta idp Discovery Value for OKTA widget

AD.name: Okta Public Key URL
AD.description: Okta Endpoint for retrieving public keys

AD.name: Okta JWT Expiration Leeway
AD.description: The length of leeway (in seconds) allowed when validating jwt expiration

AD.name: Default Post Authentication Redirect URL
AD.description: Default Post Authentication Redirect URL

AD.name: Default Post SignOut Redirect URL
AD.description: Default Post SingOut Redirect URL

AD.name: Default MyEaton SAML SSO URL
AD.description: Default MyEaton SAML SSO URL

AD.name: MyEaton NsRole for SAML SSO
AD.description: MyEaton NsRole for SAML SSO

AD.name: Track Download URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for user lookup

AD.name: User Lookup URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for user lookup

AD.name: User Lookup API Username
AD.description: Username for User Lookup API

AD.name: User Lookup API Password
AD.description: Password for User Lookup API. Should be encrypted with crypto service

AD.name: Max Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed overall. This value only applies to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Max Host Connections
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration. These values only apply to the number of connections from a particular instance of HttpConnectionManager.

AD.name: Max Cache Size
AD.description: Defines the maximum of the cached response before invalidating the oldest.

AD.name: Get Token URL Part
AD.description: Service URL part for Get Token

AD.name: User Profile Cache TTL
AD.description: The length of time the user profile cache should exist (Seconds)

AD.name: Security Cookie TTL
AD.description: The length of time the security cookie should exist (Seconds)

AD.name: SecurityCookie ID
AD.description: The ID of the security cookie

AD.name: SecurityCookie Domain
AD.description: The Domain of the security cookie

AD.name: SSO Cookie Domain
AD.description: The Domain of the legacy SSO cookie

AD.name: Order Center Okta SSO
AD.description: Order Center Okta SSO Link

AD.name: Order Center LDAP App role
AD.description: Order Center LDAP App role

AD.name: Bid Manager Okta SSO
AD.description: Bid Manager Okta SSO Link

AD.name: Bid Manager LDAP App role
AD.description: Bid Manager LDAP App role

AD.name: Eaton SSO Application Attribute
AD.description: Eaton SSO Application Attribute value to determine if from my.eaton.com

AD.name: Eaton Okta Widget Version
AD.description: Eaton Okta Widget version, default to 5.1.5
